description: Passionate about wood since the age of 16 I decided to focus on carpentry and I opened my business in February 2014. I offer my services for the creation and / or installation of wooden elements and tailor-made: cupboards, stairs, dressing room, doors, bookcases, furniture,shelves, mezzanines,parquet, kitchens, bathrooms, etc. Imagine and tailor your furniture, your terrace, your parquet,this is my passion . All the pleasure of a piece of furniture or an elegant, refined arrangement,functional, perfectly suited to your tastes and needs.
name: Last Name
subject: Subject
devisContent: is committed to being responsive.Ask us for a quote for any type of wood construction on measurement and we will get back to you as soon as possible,according to your request!
title: Title
bathDescription: Installing furniture or creating a custom bathroom? Your furniture will fit perfectly into your bathroom, adapting to the space.
kitchenDescription: The kitchen is probably the most important room in our homes. The installation of a custom-made or store-bought kitchen is up to your choices and tastes.
libraryDescription: A custom bookcase is not only a storage space, but also a major element of decoration and enhancement of your interior.
cupboardDescription: A made-to-measure cupboard or shelves allow you to optimize your spaces. You choose your cupboard doors: sliding or hinged, which can be molded or painted.
stairsDescription: The installation or creation of tailor-made stairs for the home, fully customizable and adaptable to your interior. Your staircase will sublimate your interior
